TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakCompletedEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>类不具有任何属性，并且不返回数据自<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件。 它用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>在完成时的任何事件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。
